channel.title: MoparScape page loading
channel.description:
Is it just me or is Mopar the ONLY website that has INCREDIBLE slow page load times? and half the time it tells me there was an error and then I have to re-submit or re-post something. Is Mopar under a constant DDoS attack? Or is this just me?
This is the error I get [code] No data received Unable to load the web page because the server sent no data. Here are some suggestions: Reload this web page later. Error 324 (net::ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE): The server closed the connection without sending any data. [/code]

item.title: MoparScape page loading
item.dc:creator: @im0wnag3 im0wnag3
item.description:
@im0wnag3 wrote:

I never get any errors/slow loading times on this site

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

It loads quick but sometimes it doesn’t load. It’s annoying because if you’re trying to post and you just refresh it will keep telling you you can’t post.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape page loading
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:16, topic:428266”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=530956.msg3878330#msg3878330 date=1325819179]
MoparScape loads ALL THE TIME in PERFECT time. It would ALWAYS load under 20-30 seconds or something of the sort, something that is quite fast. MoparScape would ONLY lag when it was just coming back online from a server failure or DDOS attack etc.
[/quote]
yeah encryptic is quite right, 20-30 seconds, to load a webpage is quite long don’t you think?[/quote]
Well I wasn’t thinking when I was typing that up, something like a second or millisecond, something of that sort.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape page loading
item.dc:creator: @Encryptic Encryptic
item.description:
@Encryptic wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:18, topic:428266”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=530956.msg3878349#msg3878349 date=1325820369]

Is it just me or is Mopar the ONLY website that has INCREDIBLE slow page load times? and half the time it tells me there was an error and then I have to re-submit or re-post something. Is Mopar under a constant DDoS attack? Or is this just me?

This is the error I get

No data received
Unable to load the web page because the server sent no data.
Here are some suggestions:
Reload this web page later.
Error 324 (net::ERR_EMPTY_RESPONSE): The server closed the connection without sending any data.

Happens every time I post.
[/quote]Same here. I have to go back and post again before anything happens.

Do you have https instead of http in your web browser?[/quote]

My URL says

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?

I removed the stuff following index.php?
I was just pointing out the “https” and it’s also crossed out.

Read full topic
